resources.string: "We are an authentic vegetarian pizzeria, coffee house, and bakery, located in Makassar, Sulawesi Selatan. We use only the freshest and finest ingredients in all our dishes - imported dark chocolate, extra virgin olive oil, and freshly roasted espresso beans. All our desserts and breads are made fresh daily in our on site bakery. Our pasta sauces and salad dressings are made from scratch. Our pizza is baked to order on thin crust dough, with homemade sauce and fresh mozzarella cheese. Downstairs we offer recently expanded A/C seating and upstairs we a have brand new roof top garden terrace. Come by and enjoy a coffee on the roof with the birds and a view!"
